data.actual_result: Voice chat input does not work in any mode (tested on communication/call mode) In addition, change to Push to Talk, reinstallation etc. does not give any results too. (but the sound input works)
data.expected_result: You should be able to talk to other people.
data.short_description:
Voice chat input does not work on Poco F1, 
on other devices without any problem.
data.steps_to_repro: - Just join the voice chat on Poco F1
